channel.title: Short Stories on Arsh Siddiqui
channel.description: Recent content in Short Stories on Arsh Siddiqui

item.title: Real Programmers Use Gmail
item.description: Real Programmers Use Gmail # I was recently having a conversation with a good friend of mine from the university. We were both students of the computer, or Computer Science majors as most people knew us by. During this conversation, I happened upon a question then that did intrigue me greatly: “What do you use to code?”. See, this programmer (along with many others at my school) happen to use the IDE (the meaning of which doesn’t matter, but I DuckDuckGoed it, and it means Integrated Development Environment if you really care) of Eclipse.
